au.gov.ga.conn4d

Interface Boundary_Raster

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Boundary
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Boundary_Grid_TestingGrid, Boundary_Raster_NetCDF

    public interface Boundary_Raster
extends Boundary
    Interface extension for the Boundary class to provide access to methods associated with raster-based data sources.
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getCellSize()
      Returns the cell size (assumed to be square) of the grid
      int[] getIndices(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate c)
      Retrieves the indices of the grid (lower left start) associated with the provided Coordinate
      int[] getIndices(double x, double y)
      Retrieves the indices of the grid associated with the provided x,y coordinate values.
      double getMinx()
      Retrieves the minimum x value of the raster.
      double getMiny()
      Retrieves the minimum y value of the raster.
      double getRealDepth(double x, double y)
      Returns the depth of the cell at the provided coordinates, taking into account the slope of the cell.
      com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate[] getVertices(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate c)
      Retrieves corner vertices associated with a cell intersecting the given Coordinate value
      com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate[] getVertices(int[] indices)
      Retrieves vertices associated with a cell intersecting a set of indices.
      java.util.List<com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate[]> getVertices(java.util.List<int[]> indices)
      Retrieves a List of vertices associated with cells intersecting a List of indices.

      • getCellSize

        Returns the cell size (assumed to be square) of the grid
        Returns:
        - the cell size of the grid

      • getIndices

        Retrieves the indices of the grid (lower left start) associated with the provided Coordinate

      • getIndices

        int[] getIndices(double x,
               double y)
        Retrieves the indices of the grid associated with the provided x,y coordinate values.

      • getMinx

        double getMinx()
        Retrieves the minimum x value of the raster. This value corresponds to the left edge position of the left-most cell.

      • getMiny

        double getMiny()
        Retrieves the minimum y value of the raster. This value corresponds to the left edge position of the left-most cell.

      • getRealDepth

        double getRealDepth(double x,
                  double y)
        Returns the depth of the cell at the provided coordinates, taking into account the slope of the cell.

      • getVertices

        com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate[] getVertices(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate c)
        Retrieves corner vertices associated with a cell intersecting the given Coordinate value
        Parameters:
        c - - a Coordinate containing positional information.

      • getVertices

        com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate[] getVertices(int[] indices)
        Retrieves vertices associated with a cell intersecting a set of indices.
        Parameters:
        indices - - a set of indices indicating position within the grid.

      • getVertices

        java.util.List<com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate[]> getVertices(java.util.List<int[]> indices)
        Retrieves a List of vertices associated with cells intersecting a List of indices.
        Parameters:
        indices -
